channel.title: Making A Dice
channel.description:
I Want To Make A Dice Where There Is 6 Sides... So There Are 6 Out Comes E.G.
You Try To Make A Sword 1/6 You Fail And Destroy Your Material 1/6 You Fail And Hurt Your Self And Destroy Your Material 1/6 You Fail But Yiou Can Try Again 3/6 You Succed...
Any Ideas...

item.title: Making A Dice
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:

Ty (^_^)[br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2007, 04:52:19 PM[/size][hr][quote=“guku116, post:2, topic:77798”]its gotta be based on something of real rs?? if you want a picture of a dice … just look for it in global objects… and add a right click to it… so you can do ‘‘make sword’’ then add a chance rate.; as you can find in russian roulette topic… and then… u just add the possibel rewards…a nd you’ll have a nice thing there…[/quote]
I Made The Russian Roullete Topic Lol…

item.title: Making A Dice
item.dc:creator: @guku116 guku116
item.description:
@guku116 wrote:

its gotta be based on something of real rs?? if you want a picture of a dice … just look for it in global objects… and add a right click to it… so you can do ‘‘make sword’’ then add a chance rate.; as you can find in russian roulette topic… and then… u just add the possibel rewards…a nd you’ll have a nice thing there…
